sen.j: 清瀧寺 (土佐市)、襌師峰寺、青龍寺 (土佐市)、金剛頂寺の住職を務めた後に土佐二大本山のひとつ賢法山常通寺(現在は廃寺)の住職になる。
sen.e: Served as the chief priest in Kiyotaki-ji Temple (Tosa City), Zenjibu-ji Temple, Seiryu-ji Temple (Tosa City) and Kongocho-ji Temple, and then became the chief priest of Kenpozan Jotsu-ji Temple (which no longer exists), one of the two major temples in Tosa.

sen.j: 天明7年吾川群名野川川郷村の農民が伊予の国に出奔した際、龍臺の働きかけでとがにんを一人も出さず村に返した。
sen.e: When the farmers in the Kawasatomura, Nanokawa, Agawa County ran away to the Iyo Province in 1787, Ryudai encouraged and made them return home with no one being injured.
